comment: Popping and clicking body parts may be a symptom of arthritis and like scratching an itch it may very well indeed exacerbate the symptoms. Who knows. I think science may some day prove a lot of these hunches we have. If I were you I would just exercise and practice good posture and try not to think about your joints.
